tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Had a good experience with Dr Hazra and underwent RCT and crown comfortably. Would highly recommend my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Great friendly doctor. I went to the doctor for filling my wisdom tooth.He politely explained the problems I could be facing in my other teeth in future and asked me to be cautious. He explained the medical situation of the particular tooth and filled it quite efficiently without much pain. The clinic also has an instant X-Ray facility so that there is no need for you  to visit  another day with your report.

Dr Hazra is super friendly and very helpful. Not only that he carefully listened to all of my problems patiently and then advised me how he is going to treat my condition. He was very easy to talk to and made me understand all the minute details of my medication. I went there alone but I had got zero complain how they operate. To be honest it was a good experience.
reply_text: Thank you madam. Hope u feel better sooner!

review: Dr. Ramsundar is a great dentist and he took perfect care of all my gum problems. He has an experienced hand with tooth extractions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: This clinic maintains all the possible hygiene, at this present pandemic situation, and specially Dr. Hazra he is a very down to earth and a wonderful person and my experience was very satisfying.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: my experience with dr. Ramsundar Hazra was extremely satisfactory. His polite nature steered me out of my fears to ask him questions.I am very content with his treament.

*********** *** **** ***** ****** ** ***** *********The clinic is very hyegenic, doctor explains every issue. Got a filling done at very critical area perfectly.
Location is also perfect in terms of parking your vehicle.

review: Process explained clearly & very smooth. Very perfect schedule. Very friendly. The charges were nominal.
Dr. Hazra was extremely helpful and quick with the procedure. He ensured proper hygiene owing to covid 19 situation
Felling satisfied after consulting. For further procedure I would recommend him first. Thank you for helping me in this situation.
